protein.general_function: Involved in protoheme IX farnesyltransferase activity
protein.specific_function: Converts protoheme IX and farnesyl diphosphate to heme O (By similarity).

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring alkyl or aryl (other than methyl) groups
mitochondrial electron transport, cytochrome c to oxygen

reference.reference_text: Glerum DM, Tzagoloff A: Isolation of a human cDNA for heme A:farnesyltransferase by functional complementation of a yeast cox10 mutant. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1994 Aug 30;91(18):8452-6.
